clinical_history: Pelvic pain with suspected ovarian pathology.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Liver appears hyperechoic with no focal lesions.
Gallbladder shows unremarkable, no stones or wall thickening.
Soft tissue region demonstrates coarse without fluid collection.
Left kidney shows enlarged, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Breast tissue shows unremarkable lesion measuring 10.52 mm.
Testes are coarse with normal vascularity.
